product_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I’ve made!
product_reviews.text: I really love this MacBook! I bought it for college and it runs smoothly for my classes. I like being able to have multiple tabs open and even multiple desktops. This MacBook charges super fast and also has a great battery life. I was obsessed with trying to find a good wallpaper to do the display justice because it is so clear!! Would also like to say that I loved ordering this from Best Buy as it was cheaper than me buying it from Apple directly and also came super fast, I got my MacBook delivered to me the next day. It also was packaged really nicely in multiple boxes and wrap.

product_reviews.title: MacBook Air
product_reviews.text: The MacBook Air 13-inch is sleek, lightweight, and decent for the price. Performance is smooth for everyday tasks, but the biggest drawback is the battery life it doesn’t stay charged as long as I expected it too. Also, it’s a little odd that the inside doesn’t even say “MacBook.” Overall, good for light use, but not ideal if you need all-day power.

product_reviews.title: MacBook Pro
product_reviews.text:
I recently purchased the latest MacBook Pro, and it has exceeded every expectation. From the moment I opened the box, the build quality stood out—solid aluminum chassis, premium feel, and a beautifully sharp Liquid Retina XDR display with deep blacks and vibrant colors.

Performance:
The M-series chip (Apple Silicon) is lightning fast. Whether I’m editing high-resolution photos, running multiple trading platforms, or just browsing, everything feels instant and smooth. Apps launch in a flash, and multitasking is effortless.

Battery Life & Efficiency:
Battery life is phenomenal—easily lasting a full workday and more. It barely gets warm, even under heavy workloads, which is a big improvement over older Intel models.
Keyboard & Audio:
The Magic Keyboard is comfortable and quiet with great key travel. The speakers are surprisingly rich and immersive for a laptop, perfect for music, movies, or video calls.

Overall Experience:
The combination of power, silent operation, and gorgeous design makes this MacBook Pro a perfect tool for work and creativity. It feels like a long-term investment that will stay fast and reliable for years.
product_reviews.author: JosephG

description.long:
Geek Squad Certified Refurbished products are thoroughly, painstakingly and lovingly tested, so you can be sure that your device will work right, right away. Geek Squad Certified Refurbished products.

MacBook Pro has a new eighth-generation quad-core Intel processor with Turbo Boost up to 4.1GHz. A brilliant and colorful Retina display with True Tone technology for a more true-to-life viewing experience. The latest Apple-designed keyboard. And the versatile Touch Bar for more ways to be productive. It's Apple's most powerful 13-inch notebook. Pushed even further.

name.short: Apple - Geek Squad Certified Refurbished MacBook Pro - 16" Display- Intel Core i7- 16GB Memory- AMD Radeon Pro 5300M - 512GB SSD - Space Gray

features.description: Stunning 16" Retina display with True Tone technology¹
AMD Radeon Pro 5300M graphics with GDDR6 memory
Up to 11 hours of battery life²
¹ The display size is measured diagonally.
² Battery life varies by use and configuration. See apple.com/batteries for more information.
³ 1GB = 1 billion bytes and 1TB = 1 trillion bytes; actual formatted capacity is less.

includedItems: Geek Squad Certified Refurbished Apple MacBook Pro - 16" Display with Touch Bar - Intel Core i7 - 16GB Memory - AMD Radeon Pro 5300M - 512GB SSD

product_reviews.title: Refurbished For the Win!
product_reviews.text: I’m blown away that I got a laptop of this caliber for under $700. I can’t say enough amazing things about the quality and care that was given and taken with this refurbished model. It captures everything I want in a Mac laptop and then some. The shipping was extremely fast and free from Best Buy and the product was better than I had expected. I’m a sucker for the streamlined capabilities Apple products have. knowing my IPad, Apple Watch, Apple notebook and my Iphone all sink together making my information I need to accessible when I need it gives me a incredible amount of freedom and confidence in the Apple brand.

product_reviews.title: SHARP MACBOOK
product_reviews.text: The new MacBook is sleek, fast, and incredibly efficient. The display is stunning, performance is smooth, and battery life is impressive. It's perfect for both work and creativity. A bit pricey, but definitely worth it for the quality and reliability Apple delivers. Highly recommended for professionals.
product_reviews.author: KimS

product_reviews.title: Fast, Light, and Beautiful
product_reviews.text: This MacBook Air is amazing. The Sky Blue color is so pretty in person, and it’s super light and easy to carry around. The M4 chip is crazy fast — everything loads instantly — and the battery lasts me all day. 16GB memory is perfect for having a ton of tabs open. Totally worth it!
product_reviews.author: Sindi

product_reviews.title: Good for the price
product_reviews.text: The M4 chip works really well for this laptop, it does have some issues with overheating and battery life due to this factor, however it still works well. I wouldn't dock a point for these issues as they are minor and don't impact the use of the laptop as much. It's also very portable and easy to use.

product_reviews.title: Excellent
product_reviews.text: I really like the laptop!!!! It works very quickly and almost does not heat up. The battery lasts all day, and the screen is super bright. Light and convenient, ideal for work, study or just surfing the Internet. All in all, if you're looking for something light and powerful, this is a great choice.
